metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4013 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the HTTPpacket-parsing functionality of the LIVE555 RTSP server library version0.92. A specially crafted packet can cause a stack-based buffer overflow,resulting in code execution. An attacker can send a packet to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
